DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate antiviral activity oral BTA-C585 compare placebo healthy volunteer intranasal challenge RSV-A Memphis 37b virus .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Efficacy Pharmacokinetics BTA-C585 RSV Viral Challenge Study
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy male female 2 . Between 18 50 year old 3 . Body mass index 18 30 kg/m2 1 . Acute chronic medical illness 2 . Abnormal lung function Positive HIV , Hepatitis B C 3 . Any significant abnormality nose nasopharynx
